dmca.title: Images DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google
dmca.body:
RE: Copyright Infringement DMCA Take Down Notice (vehicle4u.net)

Google, Inc.
1600 Amphitheatre Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043
Attn: Google Legal Support, DMCA Complaints

Sent via: Signed Email

June 27, 2011

Google Legal Support Team,

This is a notice of DMCA copyright infringement by vehicle4u.net who has stolen one of our copyrighted images for use on their MFA site.  Our image is registered by the United States Copyright Office (VAu 1-062-407).

My copyrighted image(s) shows up under the following 'Google Images' search results pages (SERPs):
Search Query: "pebble beach concours"
Google Images results Page (Google Images - Page 1, Image # 10 [attached below]) http://www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=pebble+beach+concours&bav=on.2,or.r_gc.r_pw.&biw=2084&bih=1285&um=1&ie=UTF-8&tbm=isch&source=og&sa=N&tab=wi
Google Thumbnail URL: http://t0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQag5nNRdMG41ieAeslkAxo0Th2_S9LP93lif54RDKhHfnwsHF1
Referring page: vehicle4u.net

Infringing Web Page: http://www.vehicle4u.net/pebble-beach-concours-duesenberg-coupe/
Infringing Image URL: http://www.vehicle4u.net/wp-content/uploads/2011/04/pebble-beach-concours-duesenberg-coupe_lg.jpeg

WHOIS contact information for the owner/operator of the offending website (vehicle4u.net):

ADMINISTRATIVE CONTACT INFO
solo dou
dou solo china
zhanjiang, guangdong 524100 CN
Phone: +86.1372806632 
solodou@126.com
vehicle4u.net (served on NS1.NAME.COM, NS2.NAME.COM, NS3.NAME.COM, NS4.NAME.COM)

Image stolen from: http://www.khulsey.com/stockphotography/stk_duesenberg-convertible-coupe-1933.html

As required under Sections 512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3) of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act (17 U.S.C. §§512(c)(3) and 512(d)(3)), we are instructed to place you on notice that:

1. Kevin Hulsey Illustration, Inc. is the exclusive owner of the copyrights in and to the Kevin Hulsey Illustration, Inc. website, artwork, images and photographs appearing therein (singly and collectively, the "KHI, Inc. Images"); and

2. I assert and hereby place vehicle4u and Google, Inc. on notice that their unauthorized publication of these images constitutes a violation of the DMCA and U.S. copyright law. Failure to act in accordance with the DMCA may result in damages and injunctive relief being awarded against Google, Inc. for vicarious infringement.

I swear, under penalty of perjury consistent with United States Code Title 17, Section 512, that the information in this notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

[redacted]Kevin Hulsey Illustration, Inc.
[redacted]
Carmel, CA 93923 USA
[redacted]
Email: [redacted]khulsey.com


CONFIDENTIALITY NOTICE: This message (including attachments) is covered by the United States Electronic Communication Privacy Act, 18 U.S.C. sections 1510-2521 and various similar acts and laws worldwide, is CONFIDENTIAL, and constitutes non-public information intended to be conveyed only to the designated recipient(s). Additionally, this message may be protected by the ATTORNEY-CLIENT or other PRIVILEGE. If you are not an intended recipient, please delete this e-mail, including attachments, and notify me. The unauthorized use, retention, dissemination, distribution or reproduction of this e-mail, including attachments, is prohibited and may be unlawful.
